challenge.title: Add a Submit Button to a Form
challenge.description:
Let's add a submit button to your form. Clicking this button will send the data from your form to the URL you specified with your form's action attribute.

Here's an example submit button:

<button type="submit">this button submits the form</button>
challenge.instructions: Add a button as the last element of your form element with a type of submit, and Submit as its text.

tests.text: Your submit button should have the attribute type set to submit.
Your submit button should only have the text Submit.
Your button element should have a closing tag.
